text: tavada ovun jalutvada, ohuge senavada (yuda pitiyedi) viruddhava satan kala avasthavdi, “apage deviyane! oba apa kerehi ivasilibhavaya pahala karanu mænava! apage padayan sthira kara tabanu mænava! tavada pratiksepa karana mema janatava kerehi (jayagrahanaya at kara gænimata) apata oba udav karanu mænava!” yayi prarthana kalaha
